title: Consider Consistency in Data
text: Think about how repetition of similar elements might help in making the information easier to process for your audience.

title: Audience's Ease of Understanding
text: Reflect on the purpose of your presentation. Is it to provide clarity or to challenge your audience's understanding?

title: Connect Data Type and Audience Task
text: Identify whether the data type you are using and the audience's task remain consistent across slides. This might be crucial for determining the need for redundancy.

title: When to Change Presentational Styles
text: Consider if a change in presentational styles between slides is necessary to maintain audience engagement or clarity.
